title: windowSensor
description: Window open/closed sensor for a smart room

isOpen.title: Window Open
isOpen.description: True if the window is open, false if it is closed

reset.description: Reset internal sensor state (e.g., clear last error)

windowStateChanged.description: Emitted when the window state changes (open/closed)

sensorError.description: Emitted when the sensor adapter detects an error
